Bleach art workshops offer a unique way to create stunning designs by using bleach to transform fabric or paper. Participants can experiment with various techniques to achieve different effects, from intricate patterns to bold, abstract designs. It's a fun and creative activity suitable for all skill levels, perfect for adding a personal touch to clothing or artwork.

Tatting is a technique for handcrafting a particularly durable lace from a series of knots and loops. Tatting can be used to make lace edging as well as doilies, collars, accessories such as earrings and necklaces, and other decorative pieces.

learn this beautiful craft with us in this simple course divided into 4 classes

Hand embroidery helps many of us to focus‚Å†‚Äîkeeping worries and the chaotic thoughts of our daily life away. It is meditative and has been used as a therapeutic method to improve mental and emotional health. Course Fee:- Rs.1,500 /- per session. Rs.5,000/-  4-classes.

Make & Take: Simple Tote, Pillow Cover, Two Mug Rugs, Cover for Tissues & Mini-Quilted Mat  Class Timing: Flexible timings between 11 am ~ 5 pm on Thursday, Friday & Saturday Number of Classes: 5  Fees: ‚Çπ 5500 (inclusive of the kit), Age: Above 10 years Course outline: # Getting to know the Sewing Machine  # Learning to Sew by practicing on paper # Practicing straight stitching on a cloth & making a Pillow Cover # Learn to make two Mug Rugs, Tissue Cover and a Simple Bag # Learn how to make a Baby Play Mat  # Finishing the Mat & learn to add Quilt Batting The objective of this workshop is to familiarize children with hand-building techniques, application of math concepts through fabric measurement, instilling an interest in art, while offering a platform to hone their creative skills.  A great after-school program that teaches self-confidence through skill-building among the participants in an environment that is friendly, creative and safe. Queries & Registration: Call us on +91 9880162266

QUILTING WORKSHOP - Beginners level course, 4-day course . 

You'll be learning the basics of quilting . You do not require any prior knowledge about quilting, you'll be making a simple beginner quilt , and to add to the fun we've also included 2 more fun projects in the course- an applique cushion cover & a tote bag too!!!

1. BEGINNER QUILT

note:- 4 days course
